text: In the exceptional clarity he was even able to make a direct comparison between the radar image and the ground itself. Ahead the Plain of Lombardy; to the right, Turin; to the left, Milan. The directional angle of the scanner could be adjusted to cover any particular area within its range. Geoffrey turned the scale slowly to cover the ground immediately ahead.
